DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Atrial Appendage Anatomic Subsite Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The location of the atrial appendage from which the specimen was collected that has not been previously listed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._Of or relating to a cavity or chamber in the body, especially one of the upper chambers of the heart._A natural prolongation or projection from a part of an organism either animal or plant; a part that is joined to something larger._Relating to anatomy._A position within another named site.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Property.preferredName: Renal Cortex Anatomic Atrial Appendage Anatomic Subsite
Property.preferredDefinition: The outer zone of the KIDNEY, beneath the capsule, consisting of KIDNEY GLOMERULUS; KIDNEY TUBULES, DISTAL; and KIDNEY TUBULES, PROXIMAL. (MSH2001):Relating to anatomy.:Of or relating to a cavity or chamber in the body, especially one of the upper chambers of the heart.:A natural prolongation or projection from a part of an organism either animal or plant; a part that is joined to something larger.:Relating to anatomy.:A position within another named site.

Concepts.definition: The outer part of the renal parenchyma beneath the renal capsule. It contains glomeruli and tubules.
Of or relating to a cavity or chamber in the body, especially one of the upper chambers of the heart.
A natural prolongation or projection from a part of an organism either animal or plant; a part that is joined to something larger.
A position within another named site.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
